version_description:
We are excited to introduce the new Shangri-La Mobile App! This release includes:
• Mobile Check-In and Check-Out  
• Golden Circle account access
• Easy GC Award Points redemption
• Touch ID compatibility
• Apple Calendar synchronisation
• Apple Wallet compatibility
• Bug fixes and performance improvements 

Thank you for your loyalty! We look forward to welcoming you again very soon.
Bug fixes and user experience improvements

Recent improvements include:
● Touch ID for redemption
● Remembering date selection when booking
● Auto-conversion of guest name from Chinese to Pinyin
● Search result optimization when using company/promotion code

Thank you for using the Shangri-La app! Our latest performance improvements mean that you can:
● Use Touch ID and Face ID for redemptions
● Remember the last date selected when making a booking
● Enjoy enhanced search results when using company/promotion code
● Enable auto-conversion of guest name from Chinese to Pinyin

This update includes:
● Improved map accuracy
● General performance enhancement

Recent improvements include:
● Sign into your Golden Circle account using your email address 
● General performance enhancements

● "Check-in Now Pay Later" option is now available when Mobile Check-in.
● Bug fix and performance enhancements

Recent improvements include:
● Alipay as a prepayment option at all hotels worldwide
● General performance enhancements

● You can now convert your GC Award Points to airline miles.
● General performance enhancements.

● Your redeemed Dining and Spa Vouchers are now available under the 'Reservations' tab
● Bug fix and performance enhancements

● Golden Circle Account Security
In order to enhance the security and protection of your Golden Circle Account, we will introduce second-factor authentication (2FA). We encourage you to complete the 2FA process as soon as possible.
Once the verification is completed, each time you wish to change or update certain information on your Golden Circle account or complete a transaction such as a GC Award Points redemption, you will be asked to enter a one-time password.

● Golden Circle Account Security
In order to enhance the security and protection of your Golden Circle Account, we will introduce second-factor authentication (2FA). We encourage you to complete the 2FA process as soon as possible.
Once the verification is completed, each time you wish to change or update certain information on your Golden Circle account or complete a transaction such as a GC Award Points redemption, you will be asked to enter a one-time password.

● Golden Circle Account Security
In order to enhance the security and protection of your Golden Circle Account, we will introduce second-factor authentication (2FA). We encourage you to complete the 2FA process as soon as possible.
Once the verification is completed, each time you wish to change or update certain information on your Golden Circle account or complete a transaction such as a GC Award Points redemption, you will be asked to enter a one-time password.

● Golden Circle Account Security
In order to enhance the security and protection of your Golden Circle Account, we will introduce second-factor authentication (2FA). We encourage you to complete the 2FA process as soon as possible.
Once the verification is completed, each time you wish to change or update certain information on your Golden Circle account or complete a transaction such as a GC Award Points redemption, you will be asked to enter a one-time password.

We have made the following updates to make your Golden Circle experience even easier.
You can now sign in to your account using your verified mobile number as well as your verified email address.
If you have any feedback, please use the Give Us Feedback section on the app, or we welcome you to leave a review.

● "Shangri-La Vouchers" transferred from "Reservations" to "My Vouchers", for easier management. 
● New feature added to enable online account activation via mobile phone. 
● New feature added to conveniently link / unlink Wechat account.

● New feature added to quick enrol with WeChat 
● New feature added to Login in with WeChat
● New feature added to Login in with APPLE ID
● New feature added to conveniently link/Delink APPLE ID account
● During hotel availability search, Business Travel Programme is added as a selection under Corporate/Special Rate code type.

● Cash & Points is now available!
● Use a combination of cash and your points to book your stay with our hotels in Mainland China.

● Improved membership account security and improved password complexity on account settings.
● Added poster sharing for voucher.

● Optimize forget password experience. Newly support special characters and symbol in password setting
● Embed hotel registration name and number in the hotel pages according to Malaysian Government Regulation
